## This is Morphe

You can do anything with Morphe. Anything at all.

The infinite is obtainable, with Morphe

The unknown is not known, with Morphe.

&nbsp;
## üåü The Infinite Possibility Engine

This is Morphe. An Android app that modifies other Android apps.

And welcome to **you**, who has discovered Morphe.

Morphe is the revolutionary Android app modification tool that defies the boundaries of what you thought was possible.

&nbsp;
## üí´ The Vision

Some say app modification is difficult. Some say it's impossible. Those people have not discovered Morphe.

This is Morphe, and anything is possible. The infinite is possible with Morphe. *You can do anything with Morphe.*

&nbsp;
## üöÄ What Can Morphe Do?

With Morphe, the only limit is your imagination. And the limits of modifying obfuscated bytecode,
but mostly imagination.

- üéØ **Modify apps** ‚Äî Morphe can do that.
- üõ†Ô∏è **Add new features** ‚Äî Features that weren't there before? Now they are.
- üé® **Customize the look** ‚Äî Change the look and feel? Limitless possibilities.
- üö´ **Remove annoyances** ‚Äî Things you don't want? they become 1 / infinity.

&nbsp;
## ü§î Who is Morphe?
Morphe is the infinite of known and unknown. The question is not who is, but who is not Morphe?

&nbsp;
## üì´ Join the Revolution

- Visit our repositories. They contain the future.
- Open issues to request infinity unknowns, or to report bugs of the infinite.
- Contributions welcome ‚Äî become part of the limitless possibilities.
